mapper.select: select * from reple where cody_idx = #{idx} order by regroup asc, reorder asc
mapper.insert: insert into reple (regroup, reple_contents, member_idx, cody_idx) values ( #{regroup}, #{reple_contents}, #{member_idx}, #{cody_idx} )

insert into reple (regroup, reparent, redepth, reorder, reple_contents, member_idx, cody_idx) values ( #{regroup}, #{reple_idx}, #{redepth}+1 , #{reorder}+1 , #{reple_contents}, #{member_idx}, #{cody_idx} )
mapper.update: update reple set reorder = reorder+1 where reorder > #{order} and reorder = #{order} and group=#{group}
